title: Scaffold Artifact v0.1
description: Schema for .ai/task-artifacts/<TASK-ID>/scaffold.yaml generated by the scaffold pass.

taskId.description: Task ID, e.g., "TASK-001". Must match the task ID in the prompt header.

author.description: Name of the operator who initiated the task

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the scaffold artifact was created (generally, the current timestamp). Format: ISO 8601

specReference.description: Reference to the spec artifact used for this scaffolding pass

file.description: Path to the file relative to the project root directory

commitSha.description: SHA of the commit that applied the change

commitMessage.description: Commit message of the change (multi-line string)

notes.description: Additional notes about the applied diff

resolvedDependencies.description: Concrete dependencies installed during the Scaffold pass, resolved to exact versions. Mirrors the Spec's requiredDependencies.

lockfileUpdated.description: Whether the lockfile (uv.lock) was updated as part of dependency installation.

notes.description: Notes about installation commands, issues, or platform-specific considerations.

unresolvedQuestions.description: List of questions that were not answered during the scaffold pass

items.description: Question that was not answered during the scaffold pass

anyOf.description: One or more questions to ask the operator, separated by line breaks (multi-line string)
